antimage_anti_spawn_03: I bring an end to magic.
antimage_anti_ability_manavoid_04: Thy life's weight in mana pay.
antimage_anti_ability_manavoid_08: Thou has borrowed heavily against thy soul.
antimage_anti_level_06: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
antimage_anti_level_07: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
antimage_anti_level_08: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
antimage_anti_level_09: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
antimage_anti_kill_10: Ha ha ha ha ha ha!
antimage_anti_kill_11: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
antimage_anti_kill_12: They who live by the wand shall die by my blade.
antimage_anti_death_06: Even in death I am not thine.
antimage_anti_death_11: There is no magic in death.
antimage_anti_death_12: Thou art a devil, pure and simple.
antimage_anti_respawn_01: I persevere in the face of evil!
antimage_anti_respawn_02: I shall spell an end to all evils!
antimage_anti_respawn_04: From this moment, none shall withstand me!
antimage_anti_respawn_05: I renew my oath to defeat all sorceries!
antimage_anti_respawn_06: The stout heart knows no fear!
antimage_anti_respawn_07: It is not magic brings me back, but purity of will!
antimage_anti_respawn_08: Beset on all sides, still I prevail!
antimage_anti_respawn_09: I'll give them a drubbing they'll not soon forget!
antimage_anti_respawn_10: Thou and I must have a frank discussion.
antimage_anti_rare_01: Vile sorcerers, to thy just reward my blade compels thee.
antimage_anti_rare_02: Send thy Dead God's legions, I will put them all to death.
antimage_anti_rare_03: I vowed to end all magic, that none may suffer the torments of the Dead God's Wand.
antimage_anti_rare_04: To avenge the fallen monastery, I will destroy every magical alliance!
antimage_anti_rare_05: I'll shatter the Dead God's legions, as they murdered the monks of Turstarkuri!
antimage_anti_purch_02: One cannot purchase virtue, so this will have to do.
antimage_anti_blink_02: What need have I for such a blade?
antimage_anti_scepter_02: I'll pray this scepter not sully my soul.
antimage_anti_lose_03: Vile magic hath won the day!
antimage_anti_win_03: The defeat of magic is complete!
antimage_anti_haste_02: The winds of virtue speed my steps.
antimage_anti_illus_02: I'll turn their magic against them.
antimage_anti_firstblood_01: First Blood! Ha ha ha ha ha ha!
antimage_anti_laugh_02: Ha ha ha ha ha ha.
antimage_anti_laugh_04: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
antimage_anti_laugh_05: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
antimage_anti_laugh_07: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
antimage_anti_laugh_08: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
antimage_anti_laugh_09: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
antimage_amp_wei_spawn_02: I'm Wei, we can get to know each other better after I kill these guys.
antimage_amp_wei_spawn_03: I've been training for this moment.
antimage_amp_wei_spawn_05: I won't let my mentor down.
antimage_amp_wei_spawn_06: Together we can bring an end to magic.
antimage_amp_wei_spawn_08: My life doesn?t matter, the mission does.
antimage_amp_wei_spawn_09: I'm here on behalf of the Tyler Estate.
antimage_amp_wei_spawn_12: Breathe Wei, breathe... its just an army, no big deal.
antimage_amp_wei_spawn_14_02: Let's show them who they're dealing with.
antimage_amp_wei_spawn_15: I'll show them what I've learned...
antimage_amp_wei_spawn_16: This is the moment I've been waiting for.
antimage_amp_wei_spawn_17_02: I can almost taste the anticipation in the wind.
antimage_amp_wei_spawn_18_02: We don't have much time, we need a plan.
antimage_amp_wei_spawn_19_02: Now is the time for action.
antimage_amp_wei_spawn_20_02: We will fight and we will win.
antimage_amp_wei_hero_intro_01: I have trained for this moment... and I am ready.
antimage_amp_wei_hero_intro_02: The Anti-Mage trained me.  Molded me.  I will make him proud.
antimage_amp_wei_hero_intro_03_02: I've waited so long for this moment... to prove not just to my mentor, but to the world what I'm capable of.
antimage_amp_wei_hero_intro_05: There's no Magi that I can't track and kill.
antimage_amp_wei_hero_intro_06: The Anti-Mage and I are similar, but we do have differences... for instance I know how to talk like a normal person.
antimage_amp_wei_hero_intro_07: I've dedicated my life to be good at one thing: hunting mages.
antimage_amp_wei_hero_intro_08_02: War of the ancients? Tss. Please. I've had to conduct an investigation in Weeping Rose, there's nothing scary about some glowy rocks.
antimage_amp_wei_hero_intro_10: I don't look forward to bloodshed, but I'm not afraid of it either.
antimage_amp_wei_hero_intro_04_alt: The Anti-Mage is not a name.  It is a title worthy of respect from the righteous... and fear from the wicked.
antimage_amp_wei_mono_01_01_02: Vanessa once told me that the Anti-Mage is just using me.
antimage_amp_wei_mono_01_02: Which isn't surprising, she's a wizard, lying comes easy for their kind.
antimage_amp_wei_mono_01_03_02: I know exactly who and what The Anti-Mage is: a man consumed.
antimage_amp_wei_mono_01_04_02: But even in his dedication and pursuit, he never once presumed to have control over me... there's a reason he insists I call him 'mentor' not 'master'.
antimage_amp_wei_mono_01_05_05: He knows why I sought him out... and he knows that my path isn't his.
antimage_amp_wei_mono_01_06_02: Like any father he has dreams of what I can become.
antimage_amp_wei_mono_01_07_02: And like any daughter I want to make him proud, but I need to do it on my terms.
antimage_amp_wei_mono_02_01_03: I can't stress how much I hate blink daggers.
antimage_amp_wei_mono_02_02_03: Like, I spent years learning how to transport through space by sheer power of will, and then I found out you can just go to a damn store and buy a 'blink dagger'?
antimage_amp_wei_mono_02_03_03: And by the way, it doesn't even really look like a dagger, it's more like a ... swirly hatchet thing that spits in the face of my training.
antimage_amp_wei_mono_02_04_03: Once I brought this up to the Anti-Mage and all he had to say about it was you should be meditating.
antimage_amp_wei_mono_02_05_03: Which is this whole other problem because meditation is just not my thing.
antimage_amp_wei_mono_02_06_03: Anyway, blink daggers.  I hate them.
antimage_amp_wei_enter_meditation_01: A war is coming... and I will be ready.
antimage_amp_wei_enter_meditation_02: Though... you'd think I'd be getting ready by training, or sharpening my blades, or ya know... doing something other than sitting and trying not to think about anything which I'm totally screwing up and BLEH.  Alright.  Starting over.
antimage_amp_wei_enter_meditation_03: hiii huuh My blades are an extension of my hands.  My hands an extension of my will.
antimage_amp_wei_enter_meditation_04: My emotions are a reflection of my actions,  not the driver of them.
antimage_amp_wei_enter_meditation_05: My mind is focused...real focused.  Like.  Really focused.  You wouldn't believe how focused my -damn it I lost it.  OK one more time.
antimage_amp_wei_enter_meditation_06_03: My blades are an extension of my hands, my hands are an extension of my will, my emotions are a reflection of my actions, not the driver of them, and my mind is focused on the task at hand because a divided mind is a weak mind, this is the creed of The Anti-Mage, this is the law of the hunt.  Boom.
antimage_amp_wei_enter_meditation_07: And now I wait until I'm needed.
antimage_amp_wei_enter_meditation_10: Like.  If someone needed help with the war of the Ancients I would be so ready.
antimage_amp_wei_enter_meditation_13_02: I should have brought a book.
antimage_amp_wei_found_01: The Anti-Mage says I survived for days before he found me.
antimage_amp_wei_found_02: He'd stumbled across the remains of my caravan.
antimage_amp_wei_found_03: On the trail of the...things that took my kin.
antimage_amp_wei_found_04_02: He was younger. Full of fire. Looking for a fight, not a child...
antimage_amp_wei_found_05: I don't remember much. But I do remember the first moment I saw him.
antimage_amp_wei_found_06_02: He likes to tell me that all he did was lend a hand. That I would have survived without his help.
antimage_amp_wei_found_07: Growing up, I even used to believe him.
antimage_amp_wei_found_08: But I've seen what the world makes of lost children.
antimage_amp_wei_found_09: Some call the Anti-Mage heartless. A monster. I know better.
antimage_amp_wei_found_10: He found a place for me. And when I was old enough, a place beside him...to learn more than just how to survive.
antimage_amp_wei_found_11: Together we'll beat back the darkness that threatens to make lost children of us all.
antimage_amp_wei_eager_01_02: The other children at the sanctuary ... Didn't really take to me.
antimage_amp_wei_eager_02: I mean, I can see why. I was insufferable. I had a destiny. I had a mentor waiting for me.
antimage_amp_wei_eager_03: And when I was old enough, which always seemed just a day or two away, I would seek him out and do great things.
antimage_amp_wei_eager_04: Can you imagine living with that? So what if it was true. They hated me.
antimage_amp_wei_eager_05: Humility is something that came later. Well, let's call it a work in progress.
antimage_amp_wei_eager_06_02: I won some of them over in the end. Kinda. Well, let's call that a work in progress too.
antimage_amp_wei_family_01_02: I don't remember much about my family.
antimage_amp_wei_family_02: I don't remember...anything about the day I lost them.
antimage_amp_wei_family_03_02: Just what the Anti-Mage told me.
antimage_amp_wei_family_05: Seeing who he is...what he's become...he's probably right.
antimage_amp_wei_family_06: But that doesn't stop me from wanting to know. Needing to know.
antimage_amp_wei_family_07: And when my training's complete, he'll owe me more than a children's story.
antimage_amp_wei_battlebegins_03: Wow, that was louder than I thought it be.
antimage_amp_wei_firstblood_01: Looks like all that training paid off.
antimage_amp_wei_firstblood_03_02: Man, I thought that would be harder.
antimage_amp_wei_firstblood_04: We are off to a helluva start.
antimage_amp_wei_firstblood_05: I don't get what the boss was talking about, these guys aren't so tough.
antimage_amp_wei_firstblood_06: First blood! Always did catch on quick.
antimage_amp_wei_firstblood_07_03: First blood! Good. That's out of the way.
antimage_amp_wei_firstblood_08: First blood! They're gonna regret letting me have that.
antimage_amp_wei_move_08: This is what I trained for.
antimage_amp_wei_move_13: We don't have time to waste.
antimage_amp_wei_attack_02: I'll make short work of them.
antimage_amp_wei_attack_13: I don't run from a fight...
antimage_amp_wei_attack_19: Only one of us will survive!
antimage_amp_wei_attack_22: Time to turn your insides out.
antimage_amp_wei_cast_01: Behold the power of the Anti-Mage
antimage_amp_wei_cast_02: By focused mind, and sharpened will...
antimage_amp_wei_cast_03: Just like my mentor taught me...
antimage_amp_wei_cast_04: I got a few tricks up my sleeve...
antimage_amp_wei_ability1_04: You're not as powerful as you thought.
antimage_amp_wei_ability1_05: You'll have to try harder than that?
antimage_amp_wei_ability1_06: You think a couple cantrips are gonna stop me?
antimage_amp_wei_ability1_07: Counter magic was my first lesson, and I learned it well.
antimage_amp_wei_ability1_09: I won't be broken by magic.
antimage_amp_wei_ability1_10: Your tricks won't work on me.
antimage_amp_wei_ability1_11: It will take more than that, magi...
antimage_amp_wei_ability1_12: You have no power over me.
antimage_amp_wei_ability2_01: I bring an end to magic.
antimage_amp_wei_ability2_06: Those who turn to magic will be punished!
antimage_amp_wei_ability2_08: You will be destroyed by your own magic...
antimage_amp_wei_levelup_03: I grow closer to my full potential...
antimage_amp_wei_levelup_05: You pick things up fast in the field...
antimage_amp_wei_levelup_06: The enemy is crafty... I must prepare.
antimage_amp_wei_levelup_07_02: My weapon is an extension of my instincts.  My hands an extension of my will.
antimage_amp_wei_levelup_08: There's so much more for me to learn...
antimage_amp_wei_levelup_09: I rise to meet this challenge.
antimage_amp_wei_levelup_11: They will yield or they will die.
antimage_amp_wei_kill_06: I think I'm getting the hang of this.
antimage_amp_wei_kill_11: These guys can't keep up with me.
antimage_amp_wei_kill_18: This fight is far from over...
antimage_amp_wei_kill_21: How'd you even get in this fight?
antimage_amp_wei_death_03_02: The Anti-Mage is gonna give me hell for that...
antimage_amp_wei_death_04: Was that good?  No.  But we can still turn things around.
antimage_amp_wei_death_06: I won't lie, I didn't see that coming.
antimage_amp_wei_death_10: I can't let that happen again.
antimage_amp_wei_death_11: They're good, I'll give them that.
antimage_amp_wei_death_12: Looks like this won't be so easy after all.
antimage_amp_wei_death_13: This is gonna be harder than I thought...
antimage_amp_wei_respawn_02: Maybe I wasn't as ready as I thought I was.
antimage_amp_wei_respawn_03: Alright Wei... let's try not dying this time.
antimage_amp_wei_respawn_04: I can't let the Anti-mage down... he's trusting me
antimage_amp_wei_respawn_07: I still have time to get revenge...
antimage_amp_wei_respawn_11: I need to be better equipped so that doesn?t happen again
antimage_amp_wei_respawn_12: I didn't spend years training in a cave just to sit on the sidelines now...
antimage_amp_wei_respawn_13_02: I've been given another chance... I won't waste it.
antimage_amp_wei_respawn_14_03: Ok... So maybe this is a redemption arc.
antimage_amp_wei_respawn_15: Is there a limit on these?
antimage_amp_wei_fastres_04: Now we take off the kid gloves.
antimage_amp_wei_lasthit_03: I'll need more gold than that...
antimage_amp_wei_lasthit_13: I'm getting into a rhythm now...
antimage_amp_wei_lasthit_15: More gold.  I need more gold.
antimage_amp_wei_lasthit_18: I'm gonna need a lot more where that came from.
antimage_amp_wei_lasthit_20: I don't think you'll be needing that gold anymore...
antimage_amp_wei_deny_09: You didn't think you were gonna collect, did you?
antimage_amp_wei_deny_18: Thanks for letting me have that one.
antimage_amp_wei_scepter_01: I can feel the power course through me.
antimage_amp_wei_scepter_02: This power is forbidden to wield, and yet it is mine.
antimage_amp_wei_scepter_03: Aghanim's Scepter is a thing to be feared...
antimage_amp_wei_blink_02: Do I need this?  No.  Am I buying this because I can?  Absolutely.
antimage_amp_wei_item_04: Why would I buy these? Must be cursed...
antimage_amp_wei_item_05: What was this one called again?
antimage_amp_wei_item_06: Assault Cuirass? Don't mind if I do.
antimage_amp_wei_item_08: I've wanted one of these for a long time.
antimage_amp_wei_item_10: I think they'll like this one.
antimage_amp_wei_item_14: I could get into some trouble with these.
antimage_amp_wei_item_24: Time to give Weeping Rose something to cry about for real.
antimage_amp_wei_item_29: Kind of expensive for a bottle of water...
antimage_amp_wei_item_33: Gem of Truesight. Thought I had one of these...
antimage_amp_wei_item_37: I'm not usually into money, but did you see those weapons in the secret shop?
antimage_amp_wei_item_58: Always be aware of your surroundings.
antimage_amp_wei_item_73: I'm all for the cunning approach...
antimage_amp_wei_item_79: Trust me. You're gonna wanna lay off the magic for a while.
antimage_amp_wei_bottle_06: I'll find the right time to use this
antimage_amp_wei_drop_rare_01: Looks like it's my lucky day...
antimage_amp_wei_drop_rare_02: Wait until the Anti-Mage sees this!
antimage_amp_wei_immort_02_02: Death will hold no power over me.
antimage_amp_wei_haste_02: Let's see them catch me now.
antimage_amp_wei_regen_02: I'll stay in the fight as long as I can.
antimage_amp_wei_bounty_03: It's not cheap getting the gear I need...
antimage_amp_wei_arcane_01: The mysteries of the arcane reveal themselves...
antimage_amp_wei_arcane_03: I will use the magi's own power against them...
antimage_amp_wei_inthebag_02_02: Their suffering is about to end.
antimage_amp_wei_inthebag_03: Call it, this thing is in the bag.
antimage_amp_wei_lose_01: This is gonna be tough to explain to The Anti-Mage.
antimage_amp_wei_lose_04: That wasn't the way this was supposed to go...
antimage_amp_wei_lose_06: How  did I let this happen!
antimage_amp_wei_lose_07: Forgive me Anti-Mage.... I failed you.
antimage_amp_wei_win_06: I was never worried for a second...
antimage_amp_wei_win_07: It was an honor to fight beside you all.
antimage_amp_wei_win_08: This was over the moment the battle started.
antimage_amp_wei_move_pain_03: I could really use a tango right about now...
antimage_amp_wei_move_pain_07_02: Would it kill someone to heal me...
antimage_amp_wei_attack_pain_05: I'll take as many of you with me as I can!
antimage_amp_wei_attack_pain_07: One of us isn't walking away!
antimage_amp_wei_attack_pain_10: You think you can break me?!
antimage_amp_wei_lasthit_pain_02: The gold makes it all worth it...
antimage_amp_wei_lasthit_pain_03: I need to make as much money while I can...
antimage_amp_wei_lasthit_pain_04: I don't know how much longer I can keep this up...
antimage_amp_wei_lasthit_pain_05: I'm running out of time to make money...
antimage_amp_wei_lasthit_pain_06: Maybe now I can buy that tango...
antimage_amp_wei_lasthit_pain_10: I'll earn as much as I can before it's too late
antimage_amp_wei_cast_pain_04: I can still turn the tide...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_01: Let the mists of Avernus die with you, Abaddon.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_02: The mists could never save you from me...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_03: Does an Alchemist count as a mage?  Probably not.  Oh well.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_04: Tricks and potions will never beat skill and training.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_05: You should have remained an apparition...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_06: You don't belong on this plane!
antimage_amp_wei_rival_07_02: This is gonna be awkward when we're back home, isn't it.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_09: You had one job Arc Warden... now look what your failure has caused.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_10: Make all the copies you want, I'll kill you all.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_11_03: I beat Axe... I BEAT AXE!
antimage_amp_wei_rival_12: I wonder if Goodkind will put me in one of her stories now...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_14: Your magic has no power over me, Bane...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_15: No one's gonna miss you, batrider.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_17: You're on the wrong side of this fight Beastmaster.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_18: My mentor spoke highly of you Karroch, I'm sorry it ended this way.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_20: Any servant of the flayed twins is an enemy of mine.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_21: Revtel should have paid you more, Gondar.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_22: You won't find me easy prey, Bounty Hunter.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_23: The battlefield is no place for a drunk.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_24: Drink it off in White Spire, Brewmaster...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_26: You couldn't beat Tusk, and you couldn't beat me.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_29: Your hunting days are over Warrunner.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_30: Looks like I'm champion of the Omexe Arena now...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_31: Well, I fought a fundamental and lived to talk about it.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_32: I can't wait to tell my mentor that I killed a fundamental!
antimage_amp_wei_rival_33: Your magic is the worst type Chen...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_34: I will never be your slave, Chen
antimage_amp_wei_rival_37: I'll carve open your tin can...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_38: Calling your magic science won't spare you, clockwerk.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_40: Go back to Icewrack while you still can!
antimage_amp_wei_rival_41: You have a mind for battle, Dark Seer... it's a shame you picked the wrong side.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_42: To think, there was time when I thought I could learn from you...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_43: You're nothing but a petty grifter Mireska...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_44: Our pasts all catch up with us eventually Mireska.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_45: You can only cheat death so many times Dazzle...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_46: Your luck finally ran out, Dazzle
antimage_amp_wei_rival_47: Turns out you were just waiting for me to show up.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_48: I guess we both agree that this is best.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_50: I'm sorry about what happened to your people Disruptor...but you never should have fought me.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_52: Back to the 7 hells with you!
antimage_amp_wei_rival_53: Eldwyrm huh, I thought you'd be bigger...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_54: You'll always live in Kaden's shadow, Davion.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_55: Traxex, your pursuit of power ends here!
antimage_amp_wei_rival_56: Your pursuit for the mists of Avernus ends here!
antimage_amp_wei_rival_58: You could take a beating, I'll give you that.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_63: It's a good thing your brothers weren't around to see your failure.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_60: If it's any consolation I think you have a cool drum.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_61: Hold on. Still trying to wrap my head around this.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_65: When I woke up this morning I didn't think I'd be fighting a deer lady surrounded by butterflies...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_66: It was you or me Enchantress..
antimage_amp_wei_rival_67: Your time on this plane is over...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_68: Back to the void with you!
antimage_amp_wei_rival_69: I thought that guy was supposed to be a dinosaur...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_71: What are you gonna do, get some ink on me?
antimage_amp_wei_rival_72: That brush isn't gonna do you a whole lot of good...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_75: It'll take more than spears to stop me...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_77: Honestly, I didn't even know you could actually stab light.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_79: I take no joy in killing a father...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_81: Nothing against you personally, but you were pretty much brimming with magic.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_83_02: Well, at least you don't have to be lonely anymore, ya know, because your dead.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_84: I don't know what Lanaya saw in you...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_85: You're funny, old man. Too bad you had to die.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_87: Next time stay on your boat.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_88: You always let down your crew Kunkka.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_91: Some days I really like this job more than others.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_95: Well that was just a public service.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_97: So you're the slayer - I'm not impressed...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_98: You are way more stab-able than your sister.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_99: You'll never make it to Weeping Rose, Lion.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_100: There is no sanctuary from me, Lion.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_101: I think I handled that pretty well.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_103: Selemene is a monster, Luna... one day you'll see that.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_107: Geez, everyone takes it so personally.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_109: Godkiller has a nice ring to it...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_111: It's a sad story, Medusa, but this is the only way it was ever gonna end.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_114_02: Sorry Meepo, you always... well, you always seemed like kind of a jerk... maybe I'm not so sorry...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_115: I guess that's about how I expected a princess to fight.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_118: Guess you weren't so reformed after all.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_123: Did you think I was gonna let you keep getting away with it?
antimage_amp_wei_rival_127: Your reign of terror is over Night Stalker.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_131: I know it--they--whatever was a monster AND a mage...but that almost felt wrong...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_133: You lost the righteous path, Purist.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_135: Wait, I had something for this...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_137: Ever start a fight not even knowing if an enemy CAN be killed. Whew.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_139: I enjoy my work. But I always take it seriously. You just learned why.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_141: Was I on your list, or are you just really unlucky?
antimage_amp_wei_rival_143: Ok, that HAS to be the last one.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_149: Is something broken in your brain Pudge? Do you even have one?
antimage_amp_wei_rival_153: I'm not some foolish man you can entice, Akasha.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_157: The Jasper Circle should have stayed out of my way.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_158: You could never hide from me Riki...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_159: Your tricks wont work on me Rubick...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_160: Now to find your father's staff...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_161: If something can't exist without magic, it shouldn't exist.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_163: No one's gonna cry about this one.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_166: The court of ristul holds no sway here!
antimage_amp_wei_rival_169: You've betrayed your oath to the Tyler estate!
antimage_amp_wei_rival_170: I wish it hadn't come to this Silencer...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_172: I finally shut that guy up.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_173: Anti-Mage never taught me how to fish... But I catch on quick.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_175: I'm sending you back to Dark Reef!
antimage_amp_wei_rival_177: Don't worry, I'll take care of your lizard.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_178_02: I feel really guilty about beating up that old lady...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_179: You fight like a coward, Sniper.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_181: Look, she was obviously dangerous. And possibly in pain. I think we're good here.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_183: I don't know what business you had in our realm. But it's over.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_186: So much bluster, so little follow-through
antimage_amp_wei_rival_187: I guess they don't make Knights of the Vigil like they used to, huh?
antimage_amp_wei_rival_191: Guess you spent too much time reading.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_194: I will never bow to demons.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_197: One less maniac to deal with...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_198: Are all the keen that nuts?
antimage_amp_wei_rival_199: Science. Magic. All the same to me.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_200: The world has enough of the arcane -- you didn't need to invent more.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_203: Ugh, I'm gonna have to spend all night sharpening these...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_205: He wasn't a magic user. Just a jerk.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_207: I told you not to challenge me, Ymir.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_209: All this power and still can't conquer the mortal realm. Pathetic really.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_212: The Anti-Mage will be pleased when I tell him how pathetic you were.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_213: You make me work for it, bear-man, I'll give you that.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_215: I don't envy your path. But it ends here.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_217: Oh man, I hope this stuff washes off.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_225: Maybe I need to pay a visit to this university of yours...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_229: Not so fast after all, ranger...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_231_03: I killed a dragon...I KILLED A DRAGON!
antimage_amp_wei_rival_233: They'll call anyone a hero these days...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_236: This time you're gonna stay dead.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_237: You shoulda stayed hiding out as a swan old man.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_238: Some god he turned out to be...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_239: Wow, killing that kid was a lot less emotionally stressful than I thought it'd be.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_240: It's past your bed time, kid.
antimage_amp_wei_rival_302: Maybe this is why Anti-Mage doesn't like pets...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_304: This is like some twisted children's story...
antimage_amp_wei_rival_305: I trust I've made myself clear.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_01: Keep your mists away from me, Abaddon.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_03: Hey, so someone said you know how to make extra gold?
antimage_amp_wei_ally_05: Why do I always get stuck with the weird ones?
antimage_amp_wei_ally_07: It's great to be on the field with you.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_08: I'm going to make you proud.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_09: You had to let the ancients break out of the moon...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_10: Ya know Warden, if you did your job properly we wouldn't be in this mess.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_11: Axe I've read every adventure Goodkind's written about you, even Red Mist, Red Passion, which is criminally underrated.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_12: Glad you're on my side, Axe
antimage_amp_wei_ally_15: You're gonna let me ride the bat when this is over right?
antimage_amp_wei_ally_19_02: Where did you get those blades, Bloodseeker...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_20: The flayed twins will have their blood today...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_22: When will they decide on Kwerthias' replacement?
antimage_amp_wei_ally_29: I've always wanted to know how I'd measure up in the Omex Arena...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_30: Ya know this would be so much cooler If you let me ride you into battle.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_34: The Knights of the Fold are just a cult with a pretty name.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_36: I've studied your story Clinkz... I'm so sorry.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_37: I always thought you were a robot.  Huh.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_38: How much would it cost for you to make me a set of that armor?
antimage_amp_wei_ally_40: You are the most bubbly mage I've ever met in my life.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_41: When the battle's over I'd love to talk tactics with you.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_42: It's nice to fight with someone who has their wits about them.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_43: At least your father cares enough to hire a bounty hunter to find you, Mireska.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_44: Guess it's us against the world, eh Mireska?
antimage_amp_wei_ally_47: Death Prophet we really need to talk.  An exorcism is when you cast ghosts away from this plane, not summon them to murder somebody.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_49: At least Sorla Khan doesn?t use magic...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_53: The Anti-Mage spoke highly of Kaden, I can see why you idolized him
antimage_amp_wei_ally_55: I think you got Windranger all wrong Traxex, she's nice.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_56: Let's see if you're as good as Windranger, Traxex...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_61: Elder Titan? Wait...didn't I read about you in some book?
antimage_amp_wei_ally_65: Keep me safe, Enchantress... it will be worth it.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_66: No one can actually be as happy and sweet as you appear to be...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_69: Hey, if you ever hear of someone breaking the Clazureme Treaty let me know, and I will stab the hell out of the mage responsible.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_73: What the hell is that abomination...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_74: I can't believe people call you gyrocopter... that's a thing, not a name.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_77: You're not too chatty are you...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_79_02: Don't worry, you degenerate. I'll be civil.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_80: Honestly though, I'm not supposed to talk to you.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_81: So do you two get along?
antimage_amp_wei_ally_83: If you have time we should have a little sparring match.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_84: What happened with you and Lanaya?
antimage_amp_wei_ally_87: Can you take me sailing sometime?  I've never been on a boat.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_88: So... you let your whole crew die... that's uh... that's heavy.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_89: We're not that different Tresdin - we were both trained to fight for something bigger than ourselves.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_91: Mark my words Leshrac: when this is done you're a dead man.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_93: This is a temporary arrangement, Lich
antimage_amp_wei_ally_94_02: I can't believe I'm fighting alongside someone as repulsive as you...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_99: Just don?t point your finger at me...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_100: The Quorum can't protect you forever Lion...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_103: You're a horrible person Luna, but Nova is adorable.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_104: Don't worry Luna, if you die on the field I'll take care of Nova.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_105_03: When the war is over, I need you to tell me about Slom
antimage_amp_wei_ally_111: If we survive this, I'll help you find your sisters Medusa... you have my word.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_114: Stay away from my wallet Meepo.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_121: Buy me some time Naga, I'll take care of the rest.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_122: Between the two of us, they're damned if they do, damned if they don't.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_131: Well, just...try not to hurt yourselves, Ogre. Or any of us.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_135: Probably a good sign you're on my team... Right?
antimage_amp_wei_ally_139: Dante, I've read about the Nivan Gallants...you need to tell me some stories...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_140: I gotta tell ya Panlin, the Nivan Gallants look like they have way more fun than The Tyler Estate.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_141: Psst.  Mortred.  Can I see your list?
antimage_amp_wei_ally_143: I've heard stories about your prowess in battle Azwraith - I look forward to fighting with you.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_144: Hope your illusions can buy me enough time...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_149: Never thought I'd be working with Pudge...but the real world's a complicated place.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_151: I don't know what to do with you Pugna... on one hand you like to burn mages.  On the other hand, you're a mage that wants to burn people.  I gotta think about this...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_152: Be grateful I have more pressing problems to deal with Pugna...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_153: Hahahaha! Oh, wow... You gotta be kidding me.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_155: Honestly, a lot of you higher beings are pretty petty about it. Just sayin.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_157: Riki, is it true you know Lorlin Lasan?
antimage_amp_wei_ally_158: See you on the field... well I mean... I won't SEE you on the field, but you know what I'm saying.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_159: I got my eye on you Rubick.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_160: You got some serious daddy issues, Rubick.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_169: It's an honor to assist the Tyler Estate.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_170: I won't let you down, Silencer
antimage_amp_wei_ally_176: Stay focused on the job and we won't have  any problems, Slark
antimage_amp_wei_ally_178: The Anti-Mage never baked me cookies...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_179: Cover me Sniper, I'm going to need time to build up.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_180: OK, so yes: I think you're a coward for using a gun, that being said, I'm super happy it's not pointed at me.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_181: You really gotta work on your annunciation.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_185: You are a magnificent bastard storm spirit.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_187: I could never betray the man who trained me... you're despicable.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_188: You have no honor Sven... I fight with you only out of necessity.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_191: Hey Lanaya, what's going on with you and Yurnero?
antimage_amp_wei_ally_197: Look timbersaw, I think it's courageous that you talk about your issues.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_199: Hmm...this science of yours sounds an awful lot like magic...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_215: Listen Venge, I'll be honest - I don't know how you put up with Skywrath for as long as you did...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_219: I'm sorry for what happened to you Viper.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_220: Viper, you don't need to be consumed by your past... there's a better way.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_221: Do you even like small talk, Visage?
antimage_amp_wei_ally_223: Let's find out if you live up to the hype...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_224: Why am I always working with emotionally stunted martial artists...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_225_04: Hnnn. College sounds like an awesome place.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_226: Do they have classes NOT about magic?
antimage_amp_wei_ally_227: Well...I'm fighting alongside a bug, didn't see that coming this morning.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_228: Yeah, but like...could ANYONE weave new threads of reality, or do you need special mandibles?
antimage_amp_wei_ally_229: Oh man, remember when we killed that necromancer?  Fun times.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_230: We'll see who gets there first, Lyralei.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_231: Hope you fight better than you write poems...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_232: So.  Auroth.  I've read some of your stuff.  It's uh... it's very... verbose.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_236: If my mentor finds out I'm helping Osterion he's gonna kill me...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_237: I'm not your type Zeus, I have self respect.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_238: Oh good.  Skeezy older men.  I really missed those when I was training in a cave...
antimage_amp_wei_ally_239: Alright kid, if you ask nicely I'll let you be my ward.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_240: Stick with me kid, I won't let them hurt you.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_300: I don't say this often...but I could really learn a thing or two from you.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_301: Of course I think it's a sad story. But that doesn't take away from the horrible things you've done.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_302: I didn't know these came in the friendly variety.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_303_02: So I had an idea for like, an obstacle course where the obstacles try to kill you.
antimage_amp_wei_ally_304: I figured we'd make a good team.
antimage_amp_wei_shitwiz_02: Do you even need to qualify the word wizard with another pejorative?
antimage_amp_wei_taunt_01: You wanna see something really cool?
antimage_amp_wei_taunt_02: The Anti-Mage was right. Practice really does make perfect. Well, pretty close.
antimage_amp_wei_taunt_03: This is the part where I embarrass you before you die.
antimage_amp_wei_taunt_05: What can I say? I'm gifted.
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_thanks_01: That was very kind of you.
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_thanks_02: Wow! I'd heard such bad things about you...
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_deny_01: Why would you think that's a good idea?!
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_deny_01_02: Why would you think that's a good idea?!
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_deny_02: Yep. The world is a messed up place...
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_deny_02_02: Yep. The world is a messed up place...
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_deny_03_02: I never thought I'd say this...but...put me back in the sanctuary.
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_all_01: Just meditate on this for a while. It won't help, but what else have you got?
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_all_02: I told you from the top how this was gonna go.
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_all_03: Can you bring your friends next time? Lot quicker if I can kill you all in one place.
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_all_04: I always leave the hellbear cubs alone. They're pretty cute and, ya know, I'll be back this way again...
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_all_05: I didn't spend all this time training just to hit creeps. But damned if it isn't hypnotic...
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_all_06: If I ever drop a thy or thine just end me right there.
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_all_07: You can't catch me, you can't beat me, you can't run from me.
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_all_08: You might not guess it, but I didn't spend much time around other kids.
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_all_09: I thought all this was supposed to be harder than training...
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_all_11: Didn't they tell you I was here?
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_all_12: I don't hate you. But that doesn't mean you're getting out of here alive.
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_all_13: It's the little things in life...
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_all_14: I wouldn't call that a win for you.
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_all_16: What was your goal in all this?
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_all_17: The scary thing is you think you're good at this.
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_all_18: Did you hear the one about how MAGIC SUCKS!
antimage_amp_wei_wheel_all_19: Crushing dreams is kind of my job.

antimage_amp_wei_laugh_07: Heh huh ha ha ha ha ha ha!
antimage_amp_wei_laugh_08: Ah ha ha ha ha ha!
